long_description: The Marmot Mavericks +20degF sleeping bag keeps you warm on those shoulder seasons of camping when you need to squeeze in a few more nights under the stars. Synthetic SpiraFil high loft insulation and overlapping shingle construction prevent cold spots and work together to keep you comfortable all night. Unique blend of 3-denier, conjugated spiral hollow fibers and 1-denier polyester fibers provides loft, warmth and compressibility. Tough polyester shell is protected with a Durable Water Repellent finish. 2-way, dual side zippers (1 full-zip that extends around footbox, 1 partial-zip) allow top of bag to fold back allowing easy entry. Brushed lining in chest and footbox for added warmth and comfort. Zipper guard runs the entire length of the draft tube to prevent fabric from getting caught in zipper. No more midnight drawcord fumbling-smooth, flat upper cord and hard, round lower cord make top opening adjustments easy. Includes compression stuff sack.
short_description: The Marmot Mavericks +20degF sleeping bag keeps you warm on those shoulder seasons of camping when you need to squeeze in a few more nights under the stars.
